name: JourneyTEAM
tagline: Commits To Provide the Highest Quality Solutions
description: JourneyTEAM is a Microsoft Gold Certified Partner with over 25 years of experience providing business technology solutions. We specialize in Microsoft Dynamics GP and SL, Dynamics CRM, SharePoint and Office 365 consulting. Our experience and approach to Dynamics and SharePoint implementations have a proven track record of success. JourneyTEAM consultants are Microsoft certified and bring together the various skill sets necessary to deliver complex business needs.
